name: M.E.A.T. Rancher 2199
description:
The year is 2199. The lab-grown meat industry has exploded, and you can make a killing with your alien meat farm and trusty combine harvester. However, the dreaded Meatblight is starting to spread! Harvest your meat trees when they get ripe, but once they get overripe the infestation will take over and spores will spread to other meatplants. Return your harvested meat to the barn and avoid the deadly spores.

Controls:

arrow keys to move

Credits:

adhesion: music, sound design, code

Brendo: art, design, code

emarcotte: code

ninjavitis: code
